page.title: 05PELHAMS CENTRE, KINSON.
page.content: The Association caters for all age groups but concentrates on the needs of the adult population.The centre is open every day from 9.0am. to 10.30pm.In 1984 there were 3519 meetings.The evening sees the centre used for such varied activities as the Budgerigar society,Spiritualist groups,War games, Bonsai society,Computer club and Drama groups. The elderly in the area use the centre in the day time as they do not like to venture out in the evenings.At one time provision was made for the unemployed but now there is a special unit for them elsewhere. Lets to foreign students in summer help with the Â£200,000 running costs. .
